6204.quoteText:
• you can select a non identifying login name and change it at any time you want,
  • you are not required to include personal data in diary posts, comments, email listserv, the wiki, or other OSM communications methods,
6204.title: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

tosdr.case: The service allows you to use pseudonyms

6205.quoteText: Further we may operate user interaction tracking software that will generate additional records of user activity, for example Piwik
6205.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

6206.quoteText:
Gravatar

The openstreetmap.org website supports the display of Gravatars, these are retrieved from gravatar.com by generating a globally unique key from your e-mail address. Our website software will check on the initial signup and on every email address change if you have a Gravatar for the new address and start displaying it if one exists. You can stop this behaviour by explicitly turning Gravatar support off in your account settings. You should be aware that, if a Gravatar is displayed, the key can be used to track your account over any website that has Gravatar support.
6206.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

tosdr.case: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties

7813.quoteText:
Cookies

Numerous OSMF operated services use cookies to store information on your login and site navigation state. We also use cookies and similar technologies to recognize and improve your use of our websites.. You may delete cookies from your computer, and most browsers provide the option to block them. If you block cookies placed by us (first party cookies), you will not be able to access parts of the OSMF websites and services that require a login. However, your access to our websites will not be affected if you disable cookies placed by third parties.
7813.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

8839.quoteText:
We may modify these Terms and other terms related to your use of the Services (like our Privacy Policy) from time to time, by posting the changed terms on the OSMF website.
All changes will be effective immediately upon posting to the OSMF website unless they specify a later date.
8839.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

tosdr.case: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user

8840.quoteText:
OpenStreetMap Foundation Services Terms of Use

Adopted by the OSMF board on September the 20th 2018.
8840.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

8841.quoteText:
You must be 13 years or older to use the Services.

If you are at least 13 but under 16 years of age, a parent or other adult authorized by your parent may create an account for you to use.
8841.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

8842.quoteText: You are free to stop using the Services any time.
8842.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

8843.quoteText: we may cancel or suspend your account for violation of any policy as determined by the Data Working Group or other Working Group.
8843.title: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms

tosdr.case: This service can delete your content if you violate the terms

8844.quoteText:
Upon cancellation or suspension, your right to use the Services will stop immediately.
Attempting to evade a cancellation or suspension (such as by creating a new account or using an alternate account) is a violation of these Terms.
8844.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

tosdr.case: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

8845.quoteText: You agree that we may freely exploit and make available any and all feedback, suggestions, ideas, enhancement requests, recommendations or other information you provide relating to the Services.
8845.title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

11633.quoteText: Because our Services are used by people all over the world, personal information that we collect may be stored and processed in any other country in which we or our agents maintain facilities.
11633.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

11634.quoteText: We provide the Services on an "as is" and "as available" basis, and we expressly disclaim all express or implied warranties of all kinds, including but not limited to the implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
